item.title: Generating Pixel Perfect PDF Reports
item.description: Have you been tasked with generating PDF reports? If you have tried using the typical tools (iText for Java, ReportLab in Python… ) you understand why it's bad. Imagine having to build a PDF like this: Rectangle pagesize = new Rectangle(216f, 720f); Document document = new Document(pagesize, 36f, 72f, 108f, 180f); // step 2 PdfWriter.getInstance(document, new FileOutputStream(RESULT)); // step 3 document.open(); // step 4 document.add(new Paragraph( "Hello World!
